Class Author

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.User
        • model.Author
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Reviewer

    public class Author
extends User
    Represents an Author within the system.
    Version:
    6/3/2014
    Author:
    Nick Ames, Richard Hemingway, Tim Loverin, Yeonil Yoo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Author

        public Author()
        Creates a new defualt Author.
        Precondition:
        None.
        Postcondition:
        A new default Author is created.

      • Author

        public Author(java.lang.String name,
      java.lang.String id,
      java.lang.String password)
        Creates a new Author with a default Type of Author.
        Precondition:
        Params must be Strings.
        Postcondition:
        A new Author is created from the given params.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the author
        id - the id of the author
        password - the password for the author

      • Author

        public Author(java.lang.String name,
      java.lang.String id,
      java.lang.String password,
      Type type)
        Creates a new Author with a specific Type.
        Precondition:
        Params must be Strings. type != null
        Postcondition:
        A new Author is created with a given Type type.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the author
        id - the id of the author
        password - the password for the author
        type - the Type for the author
